DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if 48 weeks of therapy with Pegylated Interferon Lambda plus Ribavirin is effective and safe for a treatment of chronic hepatitis C (CHC) compared to therapy with Pegylated Interferon Alfa-2a plus Ribavirin.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Pegylated Interferon Lambda Versus Pegylated Interferon Alfa, Plus Ribavirin in Subjects With Hepatitis C
